items.sentence: You didn't happen to see Tom in town today, did you?

I have an interest in my uncle's business in Boston.
I take a shower every morning before I go to school.
I like the girl I met yesterday afternoon very much.
Tom's house is about a thirty-minute walk from here.
It'll be impossible for us to catch up with Tom now.
The box that you're looking for is in the storeroom.
It was a cold evening even though it was summertime.
I'm sure that this book will be of great use to you.
